property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Air, Earth, Fire and Water Schools. Living objects cost triple spellpoints

property.name: MageSchoolCost
property.value: Air=1, Earth=1, Fire=1, Water=1, War=3, Nature=3, Holy=3, Arcane=3, Dark=3, Mind=3

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Trained in the Mind school as well as martial and monk spells. Creature spells in which the Monk is not trained, cost triple spellbook points.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Arcane school, and an elemental school of his choice: Fire, Earth, Air, or Water.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Voltaric Shield: Each Upkeep Phase, the Wizard may pay 2 mana to activate his Voltaric Shield (flip the shield marker to the ON side). The first time the Wizard is attacked and dealt damage this round, if the shield is on, flip the shield marker to the off side, and cancel up to 3 points of damage. If the shield marker is still on at then end of the round, flip it to the off side.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Trained in the Mind school as well as martial and monk spells. Creature spells in which the Monk is not trained, cost triple spellbook points.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Water school, as well as pirate and song spells.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Abilities: Siren's Call: As a Psychic Song quick spell the Siren may pay 1 mana to place her Siren's Call marker on target non-Mage creature within 2 zones. During its action phase that creature MUST move at least 1 zone closer to the Siren, if possible, and may not attack her. Return the marker at the end their Action Phase. Friendly aquatic creatures also gain Melee +2. Fermata: The Siren may extend an expiring song she controls by paying mana equal to its Level and placing a Fermata marker on it. The Siren may only have two songs affected by Fermata markers at a time, and each song may only be extended a maximum of up to 2 rounds. Amphibious: The Siren gains Regenerate 1 while in zones with aquatic terrain attached.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an enemy minor creature in this zone declares an attack, it must target Alluring Orchid. When Alluring Orchid is melee attacked, place a Rot Condition on the attacker during the Counterstrike Step.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Monk Only, Epic, Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive

property.name: Text
property.value: During each Upkeep Phase, the Mage that controls the most Living objects, may heal a non-Mage Living object up to 2 points of damage. The same Mage may also remove 1 condition marker from a non-Mage Living object by paying its removal cost.

property.value: When Pillar of Righteous Flame is cast, or a Dissipate token is removed, it attacks an enemy creature in its zone. Pillar of Righteous Flame attacks each enemy creature immediately after they enter the zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Bloodwave Greatbow is affected by a friendly command spell, his Greatbow attack gains Piercing +2 until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, Dorseus may heal another friendly living creature in this zone 2 damage. This bypasses the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each Rage token on Dragonclaw Wolverine, he gains Armor +1. If he has 3+ Rage tokens, his Ripping Claws attack gains Counterstrike.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Melting 1, Nonliving, Frost Immunity, Psychic Immunity, Flame +2

property.name: Text
property.value: Flame attacks against the Ice Golem roll 2 additional dice.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Hydro Immunity, Nonliving, Resilient, Burnproof, Frost +2

property.name: Text
property.value: Tide Elemental ignores non-critical damage from attacks and is immune to Burn conditions. Frost attacks against it roll 2 additional dice. As a Quick Action the Tide Elemental can remove all Burn conditions from one object in this zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Victorian Griffin has the Flying trait, enemy creatures in its zone are hindered and the also lose and cannot gain the Elusive trait.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bloodthirsty +2, Lumbering, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is Restrained, and gains the Unmovable trait. Uncontainable creatures can be Restrained by Bind Spirit.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Obscured trait. Each time this creature is Hit by an attack, destroy Blur unless you pay 1 mana. Blur cannot be revealed during an Action Phase or Quickcast Action. [Obscured]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature loses, and cannot gain, Melee +X traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Enchantment Transfusion is revealed, you may move any enchantment you control from this creature to one legal target creature up to 2 zones away from this creature. X = 1 for each hidden enchantment moved, or its Level for each revealed enchantment moved. Then, destroy Enchantment Transfusion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Eye for an Eye can only be revealed before the Roll Dice Step of an attack. During the Damage and Effects Step, the attacker suffers the same damage and effects as the defender. Then, destroy Eye for an Eye.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Mage attacks and damages an enemy creature, place a Charge token on Fortified Resolve. When this Mage would be damaged by an attack, you may remove a charge token from Fortified Resolve to reduce the damage from that attack by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's melee attack gain the Mana Transfer +1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only a Mage can cast this spell. While you control the fewest creatures, your attacks roll an additional attack die. Once per round, when you cast or reveal martial spell reduce its cost by 1 mana. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Friendly soldier creatures in this zone gain Melee +1. When a friendly soldier creature makes a melee attack, during the Roll dice step of that attack, they may pay 2 mana. If they do, you ma re-roll all of the attack dice (but not the effect die). If this ability is used by a minor creature, reduce the cost of this ability by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: This conjuration gains Armor +1 and Innate Life +4.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is melee attacked you must reveal Shock. After the attack, the attacker receives the Staggered condition. Then, destroy Shock.

property.name: Text
property.value: You must reveal Tar Trap when this creature activates. This creature gains Flame +1 and Restrained. Uncontainable creatures are immune to Tar Trap. [Flame +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: When an enemy Nonliving creature enters this Mage's zone, it receives 1 direct light damage. At the end of this Mage's Action Phase, each enemy Nonliving creature in his zone receives 1 direct light damage.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Mighty Bash;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=4;+2 vs. Corporeal Conjurations=True||name=Returning Throw;action type=Full;range type=Ranged;range=(0,1);dice=3;effects={8: ['Slam']}

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Mighty Bash: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] [+2 vs. Corporeal Conjurations] Returning Throw: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Dice=3] [d12] [8+ = Slam]

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bind a non-Epic incantation spell from your spellbook to Mage Wand. As a quick spell, you may pay 3 mana to change the bound spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever a spell cast by this Mage, or an enchantment controlled by this Mage, provides healing for an object, other than the Regenerate trait, he may increase that amount of healing by one. He may use this ability once per round. If he heals multiple objects (such as with a Group Heal), he only get the +1 bonus for one object of his choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target Non-Mage Living Creature heals the amount rolled on 2 attack dice. heal the caster of this spell the amount rolled on 2 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round, if it has no damage type, and no effect die roll, gains all of the attack bar characteristics above; the flame damage type, an effect roll, and the Defrost trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Ethereal trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round, if it has no damage type, and no effect die roll, gains all of the attack bar characteristics above; the lightning damage type, and an effect roll.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy as many revealed curse enchantments from the target as you wish, paying the total mana cost (casting and reveal) for each one. Then gain 2 mana.

property.name: Text
property.value: The casting Mage loses 2 life, then gains 3 mana. You can only cast this spell once per round.
